duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify and optimize work patterns within Salaried Productivity across the organization.
Run process mappings and workshops with dedicated stakeholders.
Assess departments or organization to identify potentials for improvement.
Use the train the trainer approach to support leaders and employees in the implementation of new ways of working.
Encourage a culture of sustainable change and productivity driven mind sets, to ensure that productivity goals are being achieved.
Promote and improve results by leveraging lean tools, consulting skills, business acumen and change management processes.

education_certification.credential: 5+ years experience working in consulting, working with process improvements or Lean in office areas
Fluent in English, both orally and in writing
